forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
